content.content: Hey everyone, My name is Jordan and I work on the design team at the foundation. Please take about 1-2 minutes to fill out this brief survey about vote.makerdao.com. It is also quite interesting if I do say so myself! Here is the link: Last request is to please share it with anyone who you know that is an MKR holder, that may not be as active on the forum. Many thanks, and I look forward to speaking in depth with any of you who may be open to more in depth user feedback sessions.
